thread.title: Wisconsin Hilariously Trolls Villanova On Twitter After NCAA Tourney Win
thread.title_full: Wisconsin Hilariously Trolls Villanova On Twitter After NCAA Tourney Win

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Wisconsin Hilariously Trolls Villanova On Twitter After NCAA Tourney Win
text:
Earlier today, the Wisconsin Badgers pulled off the biggerst upset of the NCAA tournament when they knocked off #1 overall seed Villanova in the second round. 
After the game, Wisconsin’s twitter account trolled Nova by posting a GIF of the infamous crying Villanova crying piccolo girl . 
SWEET. pic.twitter.com/adGsUrNWuN 
— UW-Madison (@UWMadison) March 18, 2017 

Savages.
